casebody.data:
David Shawn POINDEXTER, Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee. No. 3D17-1283 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed August 2, 2017. David Shawn Poindexter, in proper person. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, for appellee. Before SUAREZ, SALTER and LUCK, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
